Beautifully crafted web and mobile applications made at 9545 ft in the Rocky Mountains.

We help lawyers pick better juries using real-time predictives, analytics, and proprietary heuristics.    Technology Stack: Node.js, RabbitMQ, React.js, React Native, Swift, Firebase, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis, Watson, Alchemy, Google Vision, Docker.
Rebuilt backend with Service Oriented Architecture (SOA)

POSable provides point of sale developers a single uniform API that connects them to multiple cloud services and removes the costly burden of API management, authentication, and security.  Technology Stack: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Redis, Swagger, AWS, Elastic Beanstalk.
Revenue recognition for Stripe subscription billing.Technology Stack: Ruby on Rails, Ember.js, Sass, Postgres, Redis, Sidekiq, Heroku.

Pensmore Software is a payments integration company. We specialize in enhancing the payments functionality in the QuickBooks product suite by connecting alternative credit card processors, banking relationships and loyalty options. Pensmore’s products solve a substantial market need of offering truly integrated solutions at a cost effective price.Responsible for sourcing strategic partnerships and quantifying new market opportunities. Oversaw product design and development as well as backlog prioritization.  Directly oversaw a team of 3 Developers, 1 UI/UX Designer, and 1 Technical Support Agent. Re-built the existing payment application and led new products such as merchant portal, native iOS tablet POS app, closed-loop gift and multiple peripheral integrations.  Acquired by TouchSuite.

Colorado's B2B social network connecting businesses and validating service engagements.Go Code Colorado is an app challenge designed to make public data more accessible and user-friendly. Teams of developers and entrepreneurs across the state will compete to solve business problems and grow our economy, by building apps that will help Colorado companies thrive. BizLink Colorado took 2nd place in the challenge, won a cash prize, and a contract with the State of Colorado.Durango Herald Article : http://bit.ly/Sq0QXw Go Code Press Release: http://1.usa.gov/1pjrI6d

ReBill is a QuickBooks Online Add-on that manages recurring billing for QuickBooks users.  ReBill is the simplest way for businesses to collect their customer's invoice payments and automatically reconcile their accounting software.  A PCI compliant bill presentment application that offers integrated credit and ACH payments.  The venture was launched at Telluride Startup Weekend and accelerated by SCAPE (Southwest Colorado Accelerator Program for Entrepreneurs).

24-week long developer training program.  Full stack curriculum includes Node.js,  Javascript,  Ember.js,  Angular.js,  Express,  jQuery,  Ruby on Rails, CSS3,  HTML5, Bootstrap,  Responsive Design,  APIs,  REST,  JSON,  XML,  Heroku,  AWS,  PostgreSQL,  NoSQL,  Git, and Test Driven Development.

The CASB conference held annually at the Broadmoor in Colorado Springs brings administrators and two student leaders from each district to address changing educational requirements that face our state.2016 - "Design Thinking" workshops facilitated by Colorado Education Initiative.  2015 - Led a "Google Cardboard" virtual reality workshop for 130 high schoolers.  They were tasked with brainstorming ways that new tech could help shape the "Future of Education". 2014 - Working off principles in the book "Switch - How to change things when change is hard"​.    Direct the Rider, Motivate the Elephant, and Shape the Path. http://youtu.be/qmmwWxVzSsw2013 - How to Be Change Agent in Your CommunityLed two day workshop for 100+ Colorado High School student leaders on brainstorming, refining ideas, building a value proposition, and pitching to stakeholders.

Startup Weekend™ is a 54-hour weekend event, during which groups of developers, business managers, startup enthusiasts, marketing gurus, graphic artists and more pitch ideas for new startup companies, form teams around those ideas, and work to develop a working prototype, demo, or presentation by Sunday evening. Startup Weekend has grown into an organization with a global presence. As of December 2016, Startup Weekend has reached 135 countries, involving over 210,000 entrepreneurs. Startup Weekend is one of the Techstars Startup Programs, alongside Startup Week™ and Startup Digest™

recommendations: When you begin working with Tristan, you know immediately the strength of his character - always professional, always pleasant, the quintessential ‘team player’. What you come to understand is that Tristan is one of those rare developers who approaches his craft from a business-centric, entrepreneurial perspective — his considerations are more ‘what is the best solution to benefit my client’ rather than ‘what new technology do I want to learn?’ His thoughtful approach to requirements analysis allows him to look past what the business wants and addresses what they need. He is a solid developer who is also interested in all aspects of the life cycle, with a knowledge of agile processes and team development practices, he is not just ‘full stack’, but rather ‘full process’. It was a pleasure working with him, and I would gladly work with him again in the future.
